鋠字的基本解释

鋠
shèn
圆铁。

鋠字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shèn］
［《廣韻》時忍切，上軫，禪。］
(1)圆铁。
(2)作人名用字。明有弥鋠。见《明史》本传。

鋠字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　鋠； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1308第05
【集韻】時刃切，音愼。【玉篇】圓鐵。　又【廣韻】時忍切【集韻】是忍切，?音腎。義同。

鋠字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
鋠字的起名意思

暂无。

Yun
Basic explanation of words
Yun
shèn
Round iron.
Yun
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［shèn］
["Guangyun" Shi Renqie, Shangzhen, Zen. ]
(1) Round iron.
(2) Use words for names. There is a lot of money in the Ming Dynasty. See the biography of "Ming History".
Yun
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Su Ji 1] [Golden Word Department] 　鋠; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1308 No. 05
[Jiyun] The time is cut, the sound is stunned. 【Jade articles】Round iron.　[Guangyun] Shi Renqie [Jiyun] is Renqie, sound kidney. The same meaning.
Yun
